title: 1978년 Meegan 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Meegan. 판결일: 1978-06-08. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York v. William John Meegan
**판결일**: 1978-06-08
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 63 A.D.2d 1051

## 판결문 요약


Appeal from a judgment of the County Court of Sullivan County, rendered August 31, 1977, which resentenced defendant, following our remittal for that purpose (People v Meegan, 59 AD2d 576), to an indeterminate term of imprisonment not to exceed seven years upon his plea of guilty to the crime of attempted manslaughter in the second degree, a class D felony. Judgment affirmed. No opinion. Mahoney, P. J., Greenblott, Kane, Main and Mikoll, JJ., concur.
...
